mapper.select: select * from road_stage order by roadId,sort

select ABS(#{x}-backX) toX,ABS(#{y}-backY) toY,round(SQRT(ABS(#{x}-backX)*ABS(#{x}-backX)+ABS(#{y}-backY)*ABS(#{y}-backY)),2) distance,backX,backY,frontX,frontY,sort,roadId,frontThrough,backThrough,'back' bfFlag from road_stage where frontThrough=1 UNION select ABS(#{x}-frontX) toX,ABS(#{y}-frontY) toY,round(SQRT(ABS(#{x}-frontX)*ABS(#{x}-frontX)+ABS(#{y}-frontY)*ABS(#{y}-frontY)),2) distance,backX,backY,frontX,frontY,sort,roadId,frontThrough,backThrough,'front' bfFlag from road_stage where backThrough=1 order by distance limit 0,1
